summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6168 for the improvement of Nesbit Avenue from North 85th Street to North 90th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 86417, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
